Interface FlipFitCustomerDAOInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
FlipFitCustomerDaoImpl
public interface FlipFitCustomerDAOInterface
The `FlipFitCustomerDAOInterface` defines the data access object (DAO) contract for customer-related entities. It specifies the methods for interacting with a data source to perform operations related to customer data, including user account management and retrieval.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    int
    createCustomer(int userId, String phone)
    Creates a new customer record in the data source, linking it to an existing user.

    Creates a new user record in the data source.
    List<Customer>
    getAllCustomers()
    Retrieves a list of all customers from the data source.
    Customer
    getCustomerByCredentials(String username, String password)
    Authenticates a customer by their credentials and retrieves their full `Customer` object.
    Customer
    getCustomerByUser(User user)
    Retrieves a `Customer` object from the data source using a `User` object.

  • Method Details

    • createUser

      int createUser(String username, String password, String email, String name, int roleId, String status) throws SQLException
      Creates a new user record in the data source.
      Parameters:
      username - The username for the new user.
      password - The password for the new user.
      email - The email address of the user.
      name - The full name of the user.
      roleId - The unique ID of the role assigned to the user.
      status - The account status of the user.
      Returns:
      The generated `userId` of the newly created user.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.

    • createCustomer

      int createCustomer(int userId, String phone) throws SQLException
      Creates a new customer record in the data source, linking it to an existing user.
      Parameters:
      userId - The unique ID of the user record to associate with the new customer.
      phone - The phone number of the customer.
      Returns:
      The generated `customerId` of the newly created customer.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.

    • getCustomerByUser

      Customer getCustomerByUser(User user) throws SQLException
      Retrieves a `Customer` object from the data source using a `User` object. This method is used to fetch customer-specific details after generic user information is available.
      Parameters:
      user - The `User` object containing the generic user details.
      Returns:
      A `Customer` object if a corresponding record is found; otherwise, `null`.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.

    • getAllCustomers

      List<Customer> getAllCustomers() throws SQLException
      Retrieves a list of all customers from the data source.
      Returns:
      A list of all `Customer` objects.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.

    • getCustomerByCredentials

      Customer getCustomerByCredentials(String username, String password) throws SQLException
      Authenticates a customer by their credentials and retrieves their full `Customer` object. This method joins `User` and `Customer` data to return a complete customer record.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the customer.
      password - The password of the customer.
      Returns:
      A `Customer` object if a matching record is found; otherwise, `null`.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.
